title: Pakistan committed to eradicate militancy from its soil: President Alvi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 29 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi on Monday strongly condemning the terrorist attack at Karachi Stock Exchange building said militants would not be given a space to succeed in their nefarious designs.
The President said Pakistan was committed to eradicating terrorism and extremism from its soil, a statement issued by the President House said.
President Alvi paid tribute to the security guards of Pakistan Stock Exchange building who sacrificed their lives in the line of duty.
